AI Description: mhm2 is a tool for simulating liquid crystal membranes using Monte Carlo techniques. It allows users to model complex lipid bilayers and study their properties in various conditions.
Core Features: Monte Carlo Simulations For Lipid Bilayers, Simulation Of Liquid Crystal Membranes, Study Of Membrane Properties, Modeling Complex Systems
General Tags: Monte Carlo Simulation, Liquid Crystal Membranes, Bilayer Simulation
